src_original: yad dattaṃ tan na bhūyo rakṣitavyaṃ /  yad gṛhe tad rakṣitavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 已施不護，餘者守護；

src_original: yad dattaṃ tat tṛṣnākṣayāya /  yad gṛhe tat tṛṣṇāvarddhanaṃ /
tgt_original: 若已施者非愛所縛，餘者增愛；

src_original: yad dattaṃ tad aparigrahaṃ yad gṛhe tat saparigrahaṃ /
tgt_original: 若已施者非我所心，餘者我有；

src_original: yad dattaṃ tad abhayaṃ yad gṛhe tat sabhayam /
tgt_original: 已施無怖，餘者怖畏；

src_original: yad dattaṃ tad bodhimārgôpastambhāya /  yad gṛhe tan mārôpastambhāya /
tgt_original: 若已施者是道基柱，餘是魔柱；

src_original: yad dattaṃ tad akṣayam /  yad gṛhe tat kṣayi /
tgt_original: 已施無盡，餘者有盡；

src_original: yad dattaṃ tataḥ sukham yad gṛhe tadārabhya duṣkhaṃ /
tgt_original: 已施者樂，餘守護苦；

src_original: yad dattaṃ tat kleśôtsargāya /  yad gṛhe tat kleśavarddhanam /
tgt_original: 已施離結，餘者增結；

src_original: yad dattaṃ tan mahābhogatāyai /  yad gṛhe na tan mahābhogatāyai /
tgt_original: 已施大封，餘者非封；

src_original: yad dattaṃ tat satpuruṣakarma /  yad gṛhe tat kāpuruṣakarma /
tgt_original: 若已施者是丈夫業，其餘在者非丈夫業；

src_original: yad dattaṃ tat satpuruṣacittagrahaṇāya /  yad gṛhe tat kāpuruṣacittagrahaṇāya /  yad dattaṃ tat sarvabuddhapraśastaṃ /
tgt_original: 若已施者諸佛所讚，其餘在者凡夫所讚。

src_original: yāvat sacet punar asya putre 'tiriktataraṃ premôtpadyate  tathânyeṣu satveṣu tena tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 若於子所生於極愛，非他人所則為自毀。 應以三法而自呵責。

src_original: katamābhis tisṛbhiḥ /
tgt_original: 何等三？

src_original: samyakprayuktasya samacittasya bodhisatvasya bodhir na  viṣamacittasya
tgt_original: 菩提道是平等之心，非不平等心； 菩提道是正行所得，非是邪行；

src_original: bodhir na mithyāprayuktasya /  anānātvacāriṇo bodhisatvasya bodhir na nānātvacāriṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩提道是無異行得，非雜行得。

src_original: ābhis tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣya  anyatre 'mitrasaṃjñôtpādayitavyâmitraṃ hy etan mama /  na maitraṃ /  yo 'ham asyârthāya buddhaprajñaptāśikṣāyôddhuratād gatvâsmin putre 'tiriktataraṃ premôtpādayāmi /  na tathânyeṣu satveṣu /  tena tathā tathā cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yathā yathâsya
tgt_original: 復應呵己心，於自子所生怨家想、惡知識想、非善知識想，違逆佛智平等之慈害我善根。

src_original: sarvasatveṣu putrapremânugatā maitry- utpadyate /  ātmakṣemânu ... maitry- utpadyate /
tgt_original: 彼應隨處自調於心，如愛其子一切亦然，如愛自身一切亦然。

src_original: evaṃ cânena yoniśaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 應修是觀：

src_original: anyato 'haṃ /  sarvasatvâpi mama putrâbhūvan /  ahaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ putro 'bhūvam /
tgt_original: 一切眾生曾為我子，我亦是彼諸眾生子。

src_original: gṛhiṇā bodhisatvena na kasmiṃścid vastuni mamatvaṃ parigraho vā kartavyaḥ /  nâdhyavasānaṃ /  na niyatiḥ na tṛṣṇânuśayaḥ kartavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 在家菩薩於諸財物，不生我所想、攝護想，不繫於彼、不想不愛、不生結使。 「復次長者！

src_original: sacet punar gṛhapate gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yācanakôpasaṃkramya  kiñcid eva vastu yāceta /  saced asya vastv aparityaktaṃ bhavet /  nâivaṃ cittaṃ nidhyāpayitavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 在家菩薩若有乞者來至其所有所求索，隨所施財應至心念：

src_original: yady aham etad vastu parityajeyaṃ yadi vā na parityajeyam  avaśyaṃ mamâitena vastunā vinābhāvo bhaviṣyati /  akāmakena maraṇam upa-  [ Bendall ed p20 ---> ]
tgt_original: 『我所施財及不施財，俱當散滅不滿所願，必當歸死。

src_original: etac ca vastu māṃ tyakṣyati ahaṃ câinaṃ tyakṣyāmi /  etac ca vastu parityajyâhaṃ āttasāraḥ kālaṃ kariṣyāmi  etac ca parityaktaṃ na me maraṇakāle cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati /
tgt_original: 我不捨財，財當捨我。 我今當捨令作堅財，然後乃死。

src_original: etac ca me maraṇakāle prītiṃ prāmodyam avipratisāritāṃ ca  janayiṣyati /
tgt_original: 捨此財已，死時無恨歡喜無悔。
